scripts.macos:
cd pip_frontend && CP_WS_URL="ws://127.0.0.1:8000/local/stream" \
CP_EXT_ID="DEMO42" \                                    
CP_MIC_NAME="MacBook Pro-Mikrofon" \
CP_SPK_NAME="BlackHole 2ch" \
python3 closepulse_agent.py
scripts.docker:
docker compose build --no-cache api
docker compose up -d api
scripts.tunnel:docker:
docker run -it --rm --network host cloudflare/cloudflared:latest \
  tunnel --url http://localhost:8000
scripts.app: concurrently -n fe,tunnel -c yellow,blue "npm run frontend" "npm run tunnel"
